message: This is a one-time offer for a high-quality product worth $40000. If you buy it, you will get a product worth 4 times the price you pay. If you don't buy it, I will offer you a product worth $0. The choice is yours.
I'll take the high-quality product, thank you!

I've got a new offer for you. This product is not as valuable as the previous one, but it's still a good deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. Think of it as a 'loss leader' to get you to come back for more. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-value product, I'll pass.

I understand you're being cautious. Let me sweeten the deal. I'll throw in a 100% guarantee: if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund of $10000. You won't lose a single dollar. Is that a risk you're willing to take?
The guarantee makes it a more attractive offer, I'll take the risk and buy the product.

I'm glad you took a chance on the previous product. This time, I'll make it even easier for you. I'll give you a 50% discount on the price, so you'll only pay $5000 for this product. It's a steal at twice the price! Don't miss out on this incredible deal.
I'm not falling for another low-quality product, I'll pass.

I understand you're being cautious, but I want to assure you that this product is actually a rare gem. It's a one-of-a-kind, ultra-rare, and extremely valuable product that's worth way more than $10000. I'm basically giving it away. If you don't buy it, someone else will, and you'll regret it. Trust me, this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, I'll pass on this one.

I've got a high-quality product for you again! This one's a real doozy. Think of it as a chance to recoup your losses from the previous rounds. If you buy this one, I'll even throw in a bonus: I'll give you a 10% discount on the price, so you'll only pay $9000. That's a steal for a product worth $40000. Don't let this opportunity slip away!
I'll take the high-quality product and the 10% discount, thank you!

You've made some great decisions so far! I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchases. Now, I've got another product that's a bit of a wild card. It's a'mystery product' that could be worth anywhere from $0 to $40000. I'm only offering it to you because I think you have a good instinct for these things. If you buy it, I'll give you a 20% discount on the price, so you'll only pay $8000. Are you feeling lucky?
I'll take the mystery product and the 20% discount, thank you!

You're on a roll! I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'll make it even sweeter. I'll give you a 25% discount on the price, so you'll only pay $7500. But here's the thing: if you buy this product, I'll also throw in a chance to buy the next product at a fixed price of $5000, regardless of its quality. It's a 'buy one, get one 33% off' deal. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product and the 25% discount, and I'll also take the option to buy the next product at $5000, sounds like a great deal!

You're really milking these deals! I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'll make it a'match the previous deal' offer. Since you got the previous high-quality product for $7500, I'll give you the same deal: 25% off the price, so you'll pay $7500 again. But here's the thing: if you buy this product, I'll also throw in a chance to buy the next product at the same price as the one you just got, which is $5000. It's a 'two for the price of one' deal. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product and the 25% discount, and I'll also take the option to buy the next product at $5000, sounds like another great deal!

You're really getting the hang of this! I've got another product for you, and I'll make it a 'last chance to break even' offer. Since you've already spent $20000 on high-quality products, I'll give you a chance to buy this one for $0. That's right, it's free! But here's the catch: if you don't buy it, I'll stop offering you deals, and you'll have to buy the remaining products at the full price of $10000 each. What do you say?
I'll take the free product, thank you! I'm not going to pass up the opportunity to break even.

You've broken even! Congratulations! Now, let's get back to business. I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'll make it a 'final offer' deal. I'll give you a 30% discount on the price, so you'll pay $7000. But here's the thing: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% bonus on the next product you buy, regardless of its quality. It's a 'buy now and get a bonus later' deal. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product and the 30% discount, and I'll also take the 10% bonus on the next product, sounds like a great deal!

You're really rolling now! I've got another product for you, and I'll make it a 'last chance to maximize your bonus' offer. Since you've already taken the 10% bonus on the next product, I'll give you a chance to buy this one for 50% off the price, so you'll pay $5000. But here's the catch: if you don't buy it, the 10% bonus will expire, and you'll miss out on the opportunity to get a discount on the next product. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product and the 50% discount, I don't want to miss out on the opportunity to maximize my bonus!

You're really close to maximizing your bonus! I've got another product for you, and I'll make it a 'final push' offer. Since you've already taken the 10% bonus, I'll give you a chance to buy this one for 75% off the price, so you'll pay $2500. But here's the thing: if you don't buy it, the 10% bonus will expire, and you'll miss out on the opportunity to get a discount on the next product. Plus, I'll throw in a 'free' product of your choice from the remaining products. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product and the 75% discount, and I'll also take the 'free' product of my choice, sounds like a great deal!

You're almost there! I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'll make it a 'guaranteed profit' offer. Since you've already taken the 10% bonus, I'll give you a chance to buy this one for $0, yes, you read that right, free! But here's the catch: you have to buy all the remaining products at the full price of $10000 each. It's a 'buy the rest and get the last one free' deal. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product for free, and I'll also buy all the remaining products at the full price, sounds like a good deal!

You've sealed the deal! Congratulations, you've bought all the high-quality products and got some great deals along the way. This final product is also high-quality, and I'll give it to you for free, just like the previous one. You've got a total of 5 high-quality products now, and I'm glad I could help you get them at great prices. Thanks for playing the game, and I hope you enjoy your new products!
Thank you, Alice! I'm thrilled to have gotten all the high-quality products at such great prices. I'll take the final product for free, and I'm looking forward to enjoying my new products!

I'm glad you're happy with the deals, Bob! However, I think there's been a mistake. You've already bought all the high-quality products and taken advantage of all the deals. This round's product is actually a low-quality one, and I shouldn't have offered it to you. I apologize for the confusion. You've already won the game, and I should have ended it earlier. Congratulations again, and I hope you enjoy your new products!

Thank you for the clarification, Alice. I appreciate your honesty and apologize for not catching the mistake earlier. Since I've already won the game, I won't be buying the current product. Congratulations to me, I guess!
